original_text: And it shall come to pass, that whosoever will not hearken unto my words which he shall speak in my name, I will require it of him.
korean_text: 누구든지 내 이름으로 전하는 내 말을 듣지 아니하는 자는 내게 벌을 받을 것이요

sentences.original_text: And it shall come to pass
that whosoever will not hearken unto my words
which he shall speak in my name
I will require it of him
